# RSA2 (crypto Â· 90 pt)

I guess the 3rd time is the charm? Or not...

```


e=0x10001


```

go for an RSA factorization :)
We have to find the 2 prime numbers cause the result of the multiplication of the 2 prime number = N

so for that, check on http://factordb.com/

great ! it's on it


now with rsatool I'm looking for "D":

```
./rsatool.py -p 57970027 -q  -n  -e 65537
```

Now with "D" I can regenerate the private key  :) but there is a fastest solution with cryptomathic tool 



http://extranet.cryptomathic.com/rsacalc/index

we can find the hexa value of the cipher 

```
4963654354467b6e6578745f74696d655f636865636b5f796f75725f6b6579735f6172656e745f666163746f7261626c657d
```
then, converstion hexa to ascii 

IceCTF{next_time_check_your_keys_arent_factorable}


eilco
